commit message: changelog update
Build tools are updated.

Use CursorLoader to load items from the database.

Fixes #13
Grade build tools updated.
Remove build time.
App name is non translatable now.
7 new translations are added.
Translation fixes.

Utils methods are extracted into Extensions class.
DividerItemDecorations is moved to misc package.
Extracts PreferredAppsAdapter and AppRemoveDialogFragment into their own classes.

PreferredAppsActivity no longer uses TwoWayView.
DisplayResolveInfo implements Parcelable.
TwoWayView is replaced by own item selection support in the adapter.
dependency updates
fi and ko translations are removed.
Crash fix.
remove snapshot repo
Fix Crash when the component of an intent is null
Fix crash when the host string is empty.
When a SecurityException occurs, remove the link and continue.
Ignore exception while trying to get usage stats.

Catch all exceptions to prevent crash.
When Usage Settings cannot be opened, display a dialog instead.
Instead of null, return the first element.
Obfuscation disabled.
Translations updated
Prepare for release 1.1.1
beta changelog removed

Version pref changed.
It has summary with version info now. And it is clickable.
Preference style change to remove dividers.
Localisation update.
Prepare for release 1.1.1 again with couple of fixes.
Prepare for a BETA release with new support lib.
Licences are updated to remove TwoWayView.

ChooserTargetService is added to be on top of the list in Android M.
Fixes #6
Fixes in Settings Activity
Fixes for Direct Share
Prepare for release version 1.1.1.4
Crash fix related to Android M Direct Share class.
